General.Name: Aero Win Technology Corp
General.Description: Aero Win Technology Corporation manufactures various products for the aviation industry in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers super alloy sheet metal and machining parts assemblies, including oil collectors, plenum air inlets, rear and front flanges, oil cover inlets, SAGB casings, and bearing supports; and super alloy sheet metal forming parts, such as cooling inserts of vane, brackets, and combustion liners. It also offers super alloy forging precision machining parts comprising combustion chamber liners, liners, inner and outer rings for stators, flanges for stators, curvic ring assemblies, inlet housings, and diffuser cases. Aero Win Technology Corporation was founded in 1974 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Xingong Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 730
